website_summaries.verdict: The SVS Prime Tower's highly transparent sound will appeal to audiophiles hankering for big-speaker sound at a price they can afford.
pros: The SVS Prime Tower is a well-built and great-sounding speaker for the money
The "3.5-way" design offers significantly more detail than standard two-way offerings
The speakers are capable of quite deep bass and work well in a home theater context
They're available in a stunning high-gloss black finish
cons: The sound's highly detailed character can lack warmth
The rear panel's twin bass ports need a foot or more of clearance from the wall behind the speaker

customer_reviews.title: So good they made my music sound bad
customer_reviews.text: Cant describe in detail how great these are, enough to say they brought out the poor quality of my streaming music, making me upgrade to "Hi Fidelity" service. The 4-way system adds midrange depth I've never heard before. Upper ranges are totally transparent. I've had quality BOSE and Polk speakers, but these blow them away. Get them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonium Rex

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these speakers!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. The finish is stunning. The sound is rich and pristine. I had a question and Chad personally phoned to make sure I was a happy customer. I would give 6 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: M-W

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers paired with an SB-3000 have upgraded my audio experience in a BIG way. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayster

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SPEAKERS
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers. Fabulous sound that is detailed and balanced. The piano gloss is beautiful. SVS customer service is top notch. Could not be happier with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tzarina2002

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally I completed my home theater with two of SVS's Prime towers. What a world of difference compared to my old JVC tower speakers. Thanks SVS!!! More big box stores should carry your line of speakers!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: beautiful sounds!
customer_reviews.text: I had the SVS's for almost two years and they sound great, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Barry S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: amazing speakers for an amazing price. gets better with every listen.
customer_reviews.author: glory goldenwest

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderfully sounding speakers with full range. I would echo other comments that would describe these as "warm" sounding. I use mainly for Home Theater and some music and have been extremely impressed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Vest

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. After months of research I figured this ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. After months of research I figured this is the best in my budget range. I use it for my Dolby Atmos 5.1.2 setup and it sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph qamar

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional speakers with amazing clarity - the sound is true
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional speakers with amazing clarity - the sound is true, clear and crisp. These are the best deals going for their reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Martin

customer_reviews.title: SVS Primer Towers Turn it up Enjoy
customer_reviews.text: The were rated really high for performance and quality. They sound great just make sure you have a quality receiver and some serious power to drive them. Great speaker for the price. I bought 4 of them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Robello

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great for music and home theatre
customer_reviews.text: Got what I was asking for. Sound is great for music and home theatre. Not using the sub-woofer, speakers have good base enough.
customer_reviews.author: Frdurocher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound and looks
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are AMAZING! I was looking at the b&w's but decided to try these and I'm blown away! I added the sb2000 sub and now will be adding the rest of the system. They are absolutely beautiful in the piano gloss finish and the sound is unbelievable. The highs are crisp and clear, not metallic sounding, and the bottom end adds to the sound instead of overwhelming and muddling it. The speakers make it feel as if you are in front of an actual band with a crisp accurate reproduction of all the sounds. I truly could not recommended these any higher.
customer_reviews.author: John McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: These speakers will transport you to a new level of listener enjoyment. Deep bass
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are justified from CNET, Audioholics, Digital Trends, etc...These speakers will transport you to a new level of listener enjoyment. Deep bass, transparent highs, huge soundstage make these a great gateway to "audiophile" level listening. I upgraded from a Pioneer SP-PK52FS set.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Puno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for the price. Sounds like stuff that is hundreds more.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hornstein

customer_reviews.title: Good with some music , but not so much with other...
customer_reviews.text: They sound excellent with certain types of music like acoustics and male vocals. But with other types they were a bit on the bright side.
customer_reviews.author: SoundSnob

customer_reviews.title: The mid and treble were nice, but i still think you can find better ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this three stars because while they might work in some rooms, they did not work in mine. The bass was way too loud with my room acoustics and I almost instantly had listening fatigue. The mid and treble were nice, but i still think you can find better for the price. I think the prime bookshelves with a sub would be a better value and more versatile option for various room configurations, Especially if you do not have any bass management in your pre-amp. I ended up buying magnepan .7's, and to my ears, they are superior in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Best speakers in this price range.  It's not even close.
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic speakers that rival anything in this price range. They can be played at extremely loud levels with no distortion. I'm currently listening to them, so I'm too busy to finish this review. But let me say this. You can end your search here, these are the floorstanding speakers you want. They sound phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Macbook Guy

customer_reviews.title: You will not find a better speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: You will not find a better speaker for the price. I returned a pair of Klipsch 280f towers for these and they sound great. They are a neutral and very clear speaker even when played hard at high volumes. Perfect for a home theater or 2 channel stereo setup. Build quality and shipping packaging is solid. Currently running with 12 gauge Monoprice speaker wire, Prime Center, Prime Bookshelves, JL Audio E112 Sub and a Pioneer SC-81 Reciever. SVS customer service is the best if you have any questions or need help.
customer_reviews.author: Name Here

product_meta.title: SVS Prime Tower Speaker - (Each) Black Ash
product_meta.description:
Color:Black Ash

SVS Sweats The Details – You Hear Perfect SoundWith a smooth aluminum dome tweeter, dedicated midrange driver and dual long–throw woofers, the Prime Tower effortlessly cranks out clean, dynamic and powerful sound. The innovative and sophisticated 3.5–way crossover has different crossover points for each woofer to eliminate lobing in the vertical axis and improve total radiated sound power. Translation – awesome bass response and a smooth, seamless transition to the midrange.

SVS took the 3.5–way crossover concept a step further – each woofer has a dedicated and completely separate internal compartment with its own custom port tuning frequency. The result is bass you need to hear in person to fully appreciate. Similarly, the 4.5" midrange driver is mounted in its own dedicated and completely sealed compartment to ensure a smooth, precise and clear midrange free from standing wave coloration.

Driver and Crossover Details * The 1" aluminum dome tweeter utilizes an FEA–optimized diffuser which delivers a very open 'airy' presentation and extremely unveiled highs.
 * The dedicated 4.5" midrange driver delivers natural, smooth and clear vocals and features a polypropylene cone, an aluminum shorting ring for reduced distortion, a vented voice coil former, and unique all–new cast ABS–fiberglass–carbon composite basket for precise component alignment.
 * Dual 6.5" woofers outclass the competition and deliver hard–driving bass courtesy of a long–stroke suspension and rugged motor, a polypropylene cone, an aluminum shorting ring for reduced distortion, a vented voice coil former, and unique all–new cast ABS–fiberglass–carbon composite basket for precise component alignment.
feature_bullets: The Prime Tower is a reference-grade loudspeaker with pinpoint accuracy, exceptional tonal balance, effortless bass response and all the qualities of the best high-end floorstanding speakers available. A stunning achievement for two-channel audiophile or surround sound home theater systems alike, especially considering the performance value.

4.5-inch midrange driver mounted in its own dedicated and completely sealed compartment ensures a smooth, precise and clear midrange free from coloration. Dual 6.5-inch woofers deliver effortlessly deep and articulate bass to set the mood and punctuate the low-end impact of instruments, basslines and movie sound effects. 1-inch aluminum dome tweeter is light, efficient, and rigid, and plays crystal clear at high volumes. The clarity offers a sense of transparency, while offering an ‘airy’ presen

Cone material is extremely light and rigid and maintains a flat frequency response with excellent handling across the foundational mid-range frequencies and below. Tapered edges on the Prime Tower speaker’s front baffle, known as chamfers, minimize edge diffraction for clear and precise soundstaging.

A proprietary SVS SoundMatch 3.5-way crossover enhanced by expertly refined topology ensures accurate frequency response and silky-smooth transitions between drivers as well as pinpoint imaging and phase coherency.

"A presentation that’s finely revealing, harmonically rich and rhythmically tight. The longer I listen to the Prime Tower, the more I appreciate its ability to walk the line between resolving detail and embracing the bigger picture. It’s a sound blueprint for long-term satisfaction." -HiFi Choice
